00001 package prog.assignment.gol;

00003 import java.io.BufferedReader;
00004 import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
00005 import java.io.FileReader;
00006 import java.io.IOException;
00007 import java.util.ArrayList;
00008 import java.util.List;
00009 
00015 public class FileInputHandler implements InputHandler {
00016         
00017         List<String> list;
00018         Object reader;
00019         
00020         
00021         public void setInputSource(Object inputSource){
00022                 reader = inputSource;
00023         }
00024         
00031         public List<String> parseInput(String fileName){
00032                 BufferedReader inputReader;
00033                 try {
00034                         inputReader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(fileName));
00035                 } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
00036                         Logger.logLine(Logger.INFO, "Unable to locate input file: " +e.getMessage());
00037                         return null;
00038                 }
00039                 Logger.logLine(Logger.INFO, "Input file name is: "+fileName);
00040                 List<String> inputDataList = new ArrayList<String>();
00041                 
00042                 String line;
00043                 try {
00044                         line = inputReader.readLine();
00045                 
00046                         while(line != null){
00047                                 inputDataList.add(line);
00048                                 line = inputReader.readLine();
00049                         }
00050                         inputReader.close();
00051                 } catch (IOException e) {
00052                         Logger.log(Logger.INFO, "Error while reading input file: " +e.getMessage());
00053                         return null;
00054                 }
00055                 return inputDataList;
00056         }
00057 
00058         public void setInput(List<String> list){
00059                         this.list = list;
00060         }
00061 }
